entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
